activities: CTI sells and implements technology-based solutions for network security, application security and Identity Management. Examples of CTI solutions include SaaS security services, Identity Management consulting services, data migration services, and training services. CTI supports large, medium and small organizations with deployment of such solutions, which in addition to strengthening security also help improve efficiency and lower costs. CTIs products and solution are marketed worldwide in the financial, health care, pharmaceutical, media and manufacturing industries. The aforementioned activities require access and review of data files that contain personal information.
industrysector: General Science & Technology - (GST)Computer Services - (CSV)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
personaldata: The personal data process by CTI consist of client data used in connection with software modification services
recoursemech: ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program dispute resolution
